DOC.brief_summary: The study assess benefit use spinal ultrasound epidural catheter insertion compare conventional palpation technique woman undergo cesarean section .
DOC.detailed_description: The study compare ultrasound-assisted conventional palpation technique epidural catheterization component combine spinal-epidural anesthesia cesarean section . Participants randomly assign 2 equal group . In ultrasound group : Preprocedure lumbar spinal ultrasound perform epidural catheterization . In palpation group : Conventional technique landmark palpation use .
DOC.criteria: American Society Anesthesiologists class I II . Full term parturients schedule elective cesarean delivery combine spinalepidural anesthesia . Body mass index â‰¥ 35 kg/m2 . Patients contraindication neuraxial anesthesia ( Refusal procedure , Coagulopathy , Uncorrected hypovolemia , Increased intracranial pressure , Local skin infection ) . Marked spinal deformity previous spinal surgery . Unpalpable anatomical landmark . Emergent situation .
